content: We have a scenario where we would want to add, edit or delete concepts in a ValueSet or CodeSystem. With smaller systems it will be ok to just replace the system with a new version but on larger ones it would be desirable to just amend the concept. Is this possible?

The scenario is forms system and idea is to use ValueSets for picklists. (e.g. Picklist 'Discharge Jobs' and we wish to remove 'completion of eDID' from the list). How do I edit a large ValueSet/CodeSystem.
have you looked at the patch connectathon stream?
we're planning to use the patch method for this for HL7 maintained code systems
